sub_title: data-driven marketing manager | product owner | analyst (and currently available for new ad interim assignment)
summary:
Currently available for projects / jobs to create more loyal and profitable customers. If you like to contact me, call 0031680047666 or mail hutten.wilfried@gmail.com.

A passionate, analytical marketeer who prefers to work in organizations where marketing propositions are directly communicated to consumers. Love to analyze ‘action, reaction’ in channels such as online, (e-)mail, stores and call centers in order to maximize conversion rates.

I have created and implemented successful different visions, strategies and policies around e-commerce, multichannel and customer relationship management (CRM). My knowledge and experience with online – and database marketing has often offered me essential insights and building blocks for blueprints. For the execution of marketing plan I build bridges between the areas above and between different departments such as IT, brand, marketing, sales and logistics.

The digital landscape is my playground given the many opportunities to collect and analyze consumer data. For several organizations (ISP’s / publishers / banks) I have successfully used customer knowledge to make relationships more loyal and profitable.

You can hire me for interim positions such as:
• digital data analyst
• marketing manager / senior marketeer
• customer relationship manager / CRM-marketeer
• online manager / online marketeer
• multichannel manager

Or specific projects to develop, manage or optimize:
 
• customer lifecycle communication to increase engagement, loyalty and profit 
• cross channel marketing acquisition campaigns (online & offline)
• consumer journeys  
• cross- and upsell processes 
• next best offers or automatic events to stimulate sales or usage
• communication around changes in prices or services 

I am happy to discuss your needs and to explore how to make your customers more loyal and profitable.

profile_positions.description:
- manager team CRM (2 database marketers & 1 database analyst)

- responsible for CRM policies and building customer knowledge to increase loyalty and profitability. The focus was first on the analogue market and secure internet, later on the segmented offering of ADSL.

- developed both a forecast and segmentation model based on user data (dial-up minutes) using SQL. All this to accurately predict sales per week and to sell ADSL on specific segments.
